Having looked at your last post more closely, I belive that the problem is
=
that you don't have a Frontier specified. Try going into the Modules page o=
f
your job setup and set the Frontier to BdbFrontier (it probably says
Modu=
leType or something similar now). Then try running the crawl again.
 
- Kri=
s
